room_title: Escape room "Gallery Heist" by Lockbox Escape Room in Miami
room_description: A valuable and rare painting in a new exhibit has just been stolen. You and your team are a group of renowned investigators who have never failed to solve a case. The gallery manager is being framed for the crime and needs your help to retrieve the missing painting and figure out who the thief is before itâ€™s too late. Are you as good as everyone says? Do you have what it takes to solve the mystery?
